> **Filename:** 6483.mp4, 6483.png
> **Author:** IronShears
> **License:** https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-sa/3.0/
> **Source Link:** https://www.tiktok.com/@ironshearss/video/7045127131919158534?lang=en&is_copy_url=1&is_from_webapp=v1
> **Derivative of:** SCP-6483 by LORDXVNV and Ralliston
[[/<]]
-----
Last Christmas article of the year! This article is... the whole reason I did Christmas articles this year... For real, I haven't done anything special for Christmas in like... 6 years.

LORDXVNV requested this article and said not to tell Ralliston so it'd be a surprise and I got SO excited about it(especially AFTER reading the article) I put on a whole multi-week plan of Christmas articles leading up to it as the grand finale LMAOOOOO.

I... really really like this article. It's got such a nice theme and it introduced me to another cool canon! I guess I relate to that feeling of wanting to make other people happy. That's why I do art in the first place :) 

+ [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/art:art-mycotherapy More Art Mycotherapy]
[[/=]]
[[/div]]
author: IronShears
